summary.para: A container that fetches the UIElements that draw the COPPA compliance UI and subscribes to its events.

member.name: ?:UnityEditor.Connect.CoppaDrawer.exceptionCallback(System.Action`2<UnityEditor.CoppaCompliance,System.Exception>)

summary.para: An event that fires when an exception is thrown within the COPPA Compliance UI.

member.param: The value prior to the exception being thrown.

summary.para: An event that fires when any button causes a state change within the COPPA compliance UI.
The default constructor for the COPPA UI drawer that subscribes to the callback events for the Cancel and Save buttons.
A method that retrieves the Coppa compliance UI.

returns.para: Returns the visual element containing the Coppa UI.

summary.para: Common interface for any UI containers that change the state of the project with regards to services.
An event that fires whenever the UI changes the project's state regarding services.
Retrieves the VisualElement that draws the project state-changing UI.
A container that fetches the UIElements that draw the Project Binding UI, and subscribes to its events.
An event that fires when an exception is thrown within the Project Bind UI.
An event that fires when any button within the Project Bind UI causes a state change.
The default constructor for the Drawer that subscribes to the callback events for the Link and Create buttons.

returns.para: Returns the VisualElement containing the ProjectBind UI.
